sentences.en: As the water evaporates, a crust of salt is left on the surface of the soil.
sentences.cn: 随着水分的蒸发，地面上留下了一层结晶盐。

sentences.en: Deep in the earth's crust the rock may be subjected to temperatures high enough to melt it.
sentences.cn: 在地壳深处,温度如此之高,可能足以将岩石熔化.

sentences.en: Expose ends in partial - thickness burns when the crust desquamates and falls off.
sentences.cn: 在部分厚度烧伤,痂皮剥脱和脱掉后,暴露即告结束.

sentences.en: He had the crust to ask to borrow my new car!
sentences.cn: 他竟有脸向我借新汽车!

sentences.en: In his early days, he would do almost anything to earn a crust from the sport.
sentences.cn: 早年为了能在体育界混口饭吃，他几乎什么都做。

sentences.en: Observe stoma site for bleeding, crust, irritation, and broken skin.
sentences.cn: 观察出口有无出血, 结痂, 发炎及破皮.

sentences.en: Organic rubbers develop a resinous surface crust through weathering.
sentences.cn: 有机橡胶经过风蚀后,逐呈现出树脂状的外表.

sentences.en: Remove the dish from the oven, crack the salt crust and you will find the skin just peels off the fish.
sentences.cn: 把盘子从烤箱里拿出来，弄碎鱼表面的那层盐，鱼皮就会从鱼身上剥落下来了。

sentences.en: sandwiches with the crusts cut off
Sodium is the sixth most abundant element in the earth's crust.
sentences.cn: 钠是地表中含量第6丰富的元素.

sentences.en: Stratigraphy studies the sequence of the rocks in the earth's crust.
sentences.cn: 地层学研究地壳中岩石的层序.

sentences.en: The crust of the bread is burnt.
sentences.cn: 这块面包的外皮烤焦了.

sentences.en: The crust on the snow was thick enough for us to walk on it.
sentences.cn: 冻结的雪面够厚,我们可以在上面行走.

sentences.en: The earth's crust is between 5 and 25 miles thick.
sentences.cn: 地壳有五至二十五英里厚.

sentences.en: The most ancient parts of the continental crust are 4000 million years old.
sentences.cn: 大陆地壳最古老的部分有40亿年历史。

sentences.en: The pastry crust was always underdone.
sentences.cn: 馅饼的壳皮常常烤得不透.

words.tran_cn: 生了外皮的；有沉淀的；陈旧的；陈年的
易怒的；执拗的；有壳的；像外壳一样的

phrases.tran_cn: 派皮；大馅饼皮；做馅饼的糊
土壤结皮；土结皮；土壤表壳

trans.tran_cn: 面包皮，（馅饼）酥皮，硬层，地壳
trans.tran_en: the hard brown outer surface of bread
